content:
Apparently this is not clear, so just clarifying for editors: in the main build, editors merge their own PRs. It does not happen automatically, and no one else is responsible for it.

@Rik Smithies @Eric Haas @Gino Canessa @Harold Solbrig
we have a long term branch for the proposed subscription changes and will merge soon I think? @Gino Canessa what else needs to be done?

Yes, we are working on finishing the documentation changes. @Eric Haas , I could not get the argo-subscription branch working because it was so out of date. I created a new branch argonaut-subscription and already have all the old changes plus some of the ones moving forward.
I was ignoring the long term branch
@Gino Canessa so I can delete this branch?
